title: Desarrollador Full Stack Jr.
summary: Developed and maintained web applications using React.js. Collaborated with the team to implement new features and fix bugs. Strengthened my React skills by working on large team projects.
achievements: Successfully delivered multiple web applications to clients, meeting their specific requirements and deadlines.
Received positive feedback from clients for the quality of the work done.
Contributed to the growth of the client's brand by providing valuable web solutions.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained interactive user interfaces using React.js.
Collaborated with designers to translate user designs into functional and attractive interfaces.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to team best practices.
Debugged and resolved issues in production applications.
Worked with REST APIs to integrate frontend with backend services.
